title: Director of Marketing
description:
Smashtech is one of the fastest growing companies in San Diego, CA and we promise you haven’t worked with anyone like us before. What sets us apart is that we create and market health and wellness e-commerce brands. We build each brand and product from the ground up and do everything from ideation, research & development, design, branding, sales, marketing, media, and customer service, all in-house. We’re on a mission to change the health and wellness industry with total control over the entire process, there’s nothing that can stop us!

We’re one of the best workplaces in San Diego and we’re constantly growing. We rely on the most amazing talent to help us get bigger and better. If you just can’t help but innovate, collaborate, and have fun, you’ll fit right in!

We never forget that it’s the awesome people that make us the company we are, which is why we’re obsessed with providing a dynamic and collaborative working environment you won’t find anywhere else. Thanks to visionary leadership, our dedicated team, and a truly astonishing road map, Smashtech’s growth potential is huge, and you can be part of it.

Smashtech was named “Top 50 Best Workplaces” in 2017 by Inc. Magazine and “San Diego’s Best Places to Work” in 2016-2017 by the San Diego Business Journal. Come join the fun and build something big with us!

Smashtech is looking for a Marketing Unicorn- someone who lives, breathes, and eats Direct Response marketing. We create and market our own health and wellness brands direct-to-consumer so being a conversion focused creative wizard is a must!

The ideal candidate will be an experienced professional with passion for online advertising that is able to create go-to-market Direct Response strategies that increase conversions for all health and wellness brand assets – think landing pages, emails, video ads, image ads, and all creative assets.

He/She will be a skilled marketing strategist that is not only able to provide conversion focused strategies, but make sure these strategies are executed across teams.

This role will require leadership skills; with the ability to build, manage, and mentor the Marketing department and be able to drive creativity and enthusiasm in the organization.

You have a unique combination of skills, talents, and mindset, including:

  • Develop and manage a world-class marketing strategy team
  • Overseeing implementation of the Marketing strategy – including digital marketing, email, events, influencers, social media and PR
  • Define, articulate and lead market strategy initiatives ensuring they are produced by the Creative team, programmed by the Technical team, and implemented by the Media team, for all eCommerce brands created at Smashtech.
  • Experience introducing marketing strategies to newly developed brands and developing existing brand’s messaging priorities for both customers & noncustomers.
  • Entrepreneurial mindset with the ability to serve as the voice of our Direct Response and Brand strategy to the organization.
  • Working closely with the company’s Media, Creative, and Technical teams; enabling them to meet their performance objectives by providing them with relevant data and conversion optimization strategies.
  • You have 8+ years of direct experience in online advertising
  • You have 5+ years building, managing, and directing marketing teams
  • You are driven and purposeful, with a laser-sharp focus on both strategic development and flawless execution
  • You have a proven track record of driving results oriented strategies in online marketing
  • You have a passion for and experience with marketing and retail/ecommerce KPIs, and building a team culture that values using analytics to improve our work as well as creative thinking
  • You have the ability to set priorities, meet deadlines and manage multiple projects in a fast-paced, changing environment

+1 Smash point – You can tell us why emotional intelligence is important in leadership

+5,000 Smash points – You have a proven track record of success running multiple successful marketing campaigns in the health and wellness field using Direct Response Marketing

+1,000,000 Smash points – You possess the ability to sell ice to Eskimos, Myspace to Mark Zuckerberg, and can confidently double a conversion rate overnight!

  • You’re passionate about results. Our brands reach millions of people per day, so being detail and results oriented is a genuine quality of yours. You believe that performance speaks louder than words and you constantly find ways to outperform yourself.
  • You want to keep growing. What you don’t know, you’ll jump right in and learn. You can teach yourself whatever you need to know and you always face challenges by finding your own solutions. Personal growth to you means growing in skill, knowledge, and emotional intelligence.
  • Innovation is your middle name. Our team is inventing and re-inventing every day and it takes tenacity, bravery, and the ability to see the big opportunities. Whether it’s making your day more productive, or finding better solutions for our brands and customers, you always look to improve. And if you don’t find a way, you make one.
  • You live and breathe collaboration. You love working with and learning from different types of people. You appreciate different points of view and understand that everyone plays a part in achieving company goals.
  • You work hard and stay humble. We’re still only 1% done at Smashtech. You believe that no task is below you and you’re eager to roll up your sleeves and get to work!

Working for a promising company is a rare opportunity, one we consider a lifestyle choice rather than a job choice. Our positions are challenging, but they come with amazing advantages and fulfillment to those who earn them. If you bring your ‘A-game’ to the table, here’s what we can give you:

  • Highly competitive salary and benefits
  • Health benefits with 50% employer contribution (Medical, Dental, Vision)
  • Flexible paid time off
  • Flexible working hours
  • Fully-paid company vacation
  • 401k with 4% employer match
  • Company discount on Apple products
  • Free, fully-stocked pantry with food, drinks, and snacks to keep you fueled all day long
  • Free monthly parking
  • Free gym membership to Fit Athletic Club
  • Free catered lunches on Fridays
  • Free monthly social activities
  • Relocation reimbursement expenses
  1. Gorgeous, custom-built, bright office with floor to ceiling glass windows, hardwood floors, and ocean views. We’re conveniently located in Downtown San Diego with 4,000 square feet of open office space— no walls, no cubicles!
  2. Awesome environment that includes weekly fitness challenges, company bikes, a video game lounge, a cornhole toss set, a beer pong table, lovesacs, and an outdoor terrace.
  3. The chance to learn from some of the best people in the business through frequent— if not daily—interaction with our fiercely compassionate leadership team.
  4. Challenging and meaningful problems to solve— our team members constantly have the chance to make a difference and create a huge impact.
  5. A vibrant and devoted team of mixed personalities and creative minds, who still find time for fun!
  6. We invest in our team with personal and professional development, to provide them with the tools and resources they need to succeed.
  7. And most importantly, there are no egos, no jerks, no prima donnas. Just awesome folks who live and breathe collaboration.

title: Content Strategist
description:
We’re on a mission to disrupt the health and wellness industry by creating and maintaining full control over our own e-commerce brands and products.

We make living a healthy lifestyle simple, but how we do it is a far better story. When we say we create brands, we mean we actually dream them up and turn them into ecommerce sensations by managing everything in house.

We do it all from research & development, manufacturing, design, branding, marketing, media, sales, and customer service, for every brand we create. It may seem like a mouthful, but we don’t want anything to slow us down, hinder our agility, or tarnish our customer experience, and the best way to do that is to do it yourself. We’re not an agency, we don’t have clients, we simply create, manage, and own everything we touch.

The world is evolving fast, and we’re in the driver’s seat. We’re one of the fastest growing companies in San Diego, and because of our amazing culture, we’re featured by Inc. Magazine as one of top 50 Best Workplaces in the country. And this is just the beginning.

• Top 50 Best Workplaces in America – Inc. Magazine
• Best Places to Work 2016 & 2017 – San Diego Business Journal

Smashtech just keeps on growing and we’re looking for a kickass Content Strategist with a proven track record of success to join our amazing team. You will play an essential role in planning, writing, scheduling, and optimizing content for conversion. You will be surrounded by top talent and will be responsible for creating and implementing effective content plans and collaborating with the creative team to develop content that will break the internet.

We’re looking for an experienced Content Strategist who can switch between left and right brain thinking with ease: someone who nerds out on analytics and gets excited about writing for creative assets. The perfect candidate can show us how he/she has boosted webpage visits, social media following and engagement, and most importantly, bottom of the funnel conversions. If you perform well under deadlines, are detail-oriented, have a knack for writing and strategic thinking and are an expert in content optimization, we would like to meet you!

  • Liaise with content team to ensure brand consistency

  • Leverage technology to provide the most robust influencer options and analytics
  • Use content management systems to analyze website traffic and users engagement metrics
  • Manage content distribution to online channels and social media platforms
  • Conduct market research and analysis to become an expert in the topics that matter to our business and consumer audience, and how they consume content, then apply these lessons to how we interact with our audience
  • Stay up-to-date with developments and generate new ideas to draw audience’s attention
  • 4+ years’ experience in content development, creation, editing and planning. Preferably in the health and wellness industry.
  • Demonstrate a healthy balance of creative, editorial, and strategic skills
  • Able to manage own workflow while coordinating with project teams and management on schedules, requirements, goals, and assignments as needed
  • Proficient with web content best practices, including SEO, web publishing, and uploading content into a content management system
  • Proficient in social media and email marketing
  • Familiarity with conversion best practices
  • Able to think strategically and work collaboratively with a team
  • Good organizational and tfaime-management skills
  • Able to work in a fast-paced, professional office environment
  • Willing to take direction if and when needed, but also work independently
  • Able to effectively manage relationships, both internally and externally
  • BS degree in Marketing or relevant field

Your team will be immersed in core web development, conversion funnel optimization, A/B testing, customer acquisition efforts, and standard e-commerce functionality (cart/checkout/payment), so expertise in these fields are required. For additional responsibilities and requirements, please see below.

title: Account Specialist
description:
We promise you haven’t worked with anyone like us before. Smashtech is a San Diego, CA based company that builds premium health and wellness brands from the ground up. We do everything from research & development, design, sales, marketing, media, and customer service, all in-house.

We’re one of the fastest growing companies in San Diego and we’re proud of our unique culture. We work closely together, move fast, find the best way to do things, and enjoy what we do.

We never forget that it’s the awesome people that make us the company we are, which is why we’re obsessed with providing a dynamic and collaborative working environment you won’t find anywhere else. Thanks to visionary leadership, our dedicated team, and a truly astonishing road map, Smashtech’s growth potential is huge. And you can be part of it.

Smashtech was named “50 Best Places to Work in 2017” by INC. Magazine and “San Diego’s Best Place to Work 2016” by the San Diego Business Journal. Come join the fun and build something big with us!

As a Rockstar Account Specialist, you are a key player on our Customer Experience team. The Account Specialist’s primary goals are to build relationships with, educate, and ultimately monetize our extensive customer database.

We currently support some of the most innovative products for health, beauty, and fitness.

  • Courteous, compassionate, and empathetic
  • Self-controlled and thrives under pressure
  • Comfortable in a fun and competitive team environment
  • Adept at turning “negatives” into “positives”
  • A clear, effective communicator and problem solver
  • Organized, attentive, and a quick learner
  • Goal oriented and consistently exceeds expectations
  • Computer and internet savvy
  • Flexible, friendly, and takes ownership of his/her tasks
  • Bonus if you’re passionate about health and fitness

A successful candidate will play a fundamental role in achieving our ambitious customer acquisition and revenue growth objectives. You must be comfortable handling dozens of outbound calls per day, generating interest, qualifying prospects, and closing sales.

  • Source new sales opportunities through outbound warm leads
  • Educate and upsell current customers on new product offers
  • Understand and listen to customer needs and concerns
  • Close sales and achieve monthly/quarterly goals
  • Team up with internal marketing to build additional product pipelines
  • Proven inside sales ability
  • Track record of over-achieving quota
  • Strong phone presence and experience dialing dozens of calls per day
  • Proficient with corporate productivity and web presentation tools
  • Experience working with a CRM or Contact Center Software
  • Excellent verbal and written communications skills
  • Strong listening and presentation skills
  • Ability to multi-task, prioritize, and manage time effectively

We offer exceptionally competitive salaries for our Account Specialists with an additional monthly bonus plan based on performance. We also offer an attractive benefits package for core employees and look to fill leadership roles from within.

Working for a promising company is a rare opportunity, one we consider a lifestyle choice rather than a job choice. Our positions are challenging, but also come with amazing advantages and fulfillment to those who earn them. If you bring your ‘A game’ to the table, here’s what we’ll bring:

  • Highly Competitive Salary and Benefits
  • Health Benefits with 50% Employer Contribution (Medical, Dental, Vision)
  • Flexible Paid Time Off
  • Flexible Working Hours
  • Fully Paid Company Vacation
  • 401k with 4% Employer Match
  • Company Discount on Apple Products
  • Free Fully Stocked Office Foods, Drinks, and Snacks to keep you fueled all day long
  • Free Monthly Parking
  • Free Gym Membership to Fit Athletic Club
  • Free Catered Lunches on Fridays
  • Free Monthly Social Activities
  • Relocation Reimbursement upon Employment Offer
  • A gorgeous, custom-built, bright office with floor to ceiling glass windows, hardwood floors, and ocean views. We’re conveniently located in Downtown San Diego with 4,000 square feet of open office space – no walls, no cubicles!
  • Awesome environment that includes weekly fitness challenges, company bikes, video game lounge, corn hole, beer pong, lovesacs and an outdoor terrace
  • The chance to learn from some of the best people in the business through frequent – if not daily – interaction with our fiercely compassionate leadership team Challenging and meaningful problems to solve – you will invariably make a difference and impact
  • A vibrant and devoted team of mixed personalities and creative minds, who still find time for fun!
  • We invest in you with personal and professional development, to provide you the room and tools you need to create and succeed.
  • And in case you were wondering: no politics, no b.s., and no jerks.

*Employment is Full-Time in our San Diego, California Office.
